author: Windclaw

text: Late responce, I know, but I'm sure it's because it's hard to sum up the plot of the game. In fact, it would be kind of a spoiler to say what the game is about in an overall sence. It mostly revolves around a war in the past with genetically modified soldiers. Xenosaga takes place in the distant future, though, and this "past war" is still way in the future. The games are VERY plot heavy, so keep that in mind if you don't like a lot of talking in your RPG's.
